Entries.307010400/t 1400 1800/n AbigailHiddenFor: continue/27 12/farmer 29 14 3 Abigail 26 14 1/pause 2000/message "So, you and Abigail arrived in the secret part of forest. You see a nice lawn to set up picnic. This warm day looks promising."/question fork1 "So, what should I do?# Let’s set it up.#That’s better to go home (end event)."/fork AbigailDateEnd/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/specificTemporarySprite EmilyCamping/viewport 27 12/pause 500/speak Abigail "This is such a lovely place! I’ve never been here before. How did you find this place?"/question fork1 "@ tell me something about this place#Tell her a story about slimes dissolving clothes.#Tell her about your adventures."/fork AbigailDateBorringStory/pause 500/speak Abigail "Eeek! Are you serious? Now way, you kidding me! #$b#Hmm, so there are slimes, but they don’t dissolving clothes. #$b#But this is dangerous anyway!#$b#Oh You’ll protect me? So there is nothing to worry about.$l"/pause 500/message "The rest of date went smoothly she was completely satisfied."/friendship Abigail 100/friendship AbigailLewd 100/end warpOut
Entries.AbigailDateEnd: speak Abigail "Really? You asked me out for this short walk?"/message "She is really disappointed."/friendship Abigail -100/friendship AbigailLewd 0/end warpOut

Entries.307010400/t 1400 1800/n AbigailHiddenFor: continue/27 12/farmer 29 14 3 Abigail 26 14 1/pause 2000/message "So, you and Abigail arrived in the Forest. There are a lot of snow around, so it will be hard to find a place to set up picnic. The weather is pretty cold. "/question fork1 "So, what should I do?#Let’s set it up.#That’s better to go home (end event)."/fork AbigailDateEnd/pause 500/speak Abigail "What? Are you seriously want to set on snow and make a picnic at this weather? No way! Let’s better investigate this place!"/globalFade/viewPort -1000 -1000/warp farmer 18 23/warp Abigail 18 24/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Abigail 3/viewport 18 24/question fork1 "You walk in the forest and talk on different topics. #Let’s talk about lewd things#Let’s talk about neutral things"/fork AbigailDateBorringStory/pause 500/speak Abigail "Stop! This weird, if we weren't friends, I would have thought that you a pervert.$l"/pause 500/message "The rest of date went smoothly she was completely satisfied."/friendship Abigail 100/friendship AbigailLewd 100/end warpOut
Entries.AbigailDateEnd: speak Abigail "Really? You asked me out for this short walk?"/message "She is really disappointed."/friendship Abigail -100/friendship AbigailLewd 0/end warpOut
Entries.AbigailDateBorringStory: message "You’ve told her about your adventures in secret forest, the rest of date went smoothly, she was fine."/friendship Abigail 100/friendship AbigailLewd 0/end warpOut
Entries.307010401/t 1400 1800/n HaleyHiddenFores: continue/27 12/farmer 29 14 3 Haley 26 14 1/pause 2000/message "So, you and Haley arrived in the Forest. There are a lot of snow around, so it will be hard to find a place to set up picnic. The weather is pretty cold. "/question fork1 "So, what should I do?# Let’s set it up.#That’s better to go home (end event)."/fork HaleyDateEnd/pause 500/speak Haley "What? Are you seriously want to set on snow and make a picnic at this weather? No way, I’m going home!"/pause 500/message "Picnic in the winter forest. That’s sound better then that is."/friendship Haley -100/friendship HaleyLewd -100/end warpOut
Entries.HaleyDateEnd: speak Haley "Really? You asked me out for this short walk?"/message "She is really disappointed."/friendship Haley -100/friendship HaleyLewd 0/end warpOut
